channel.title: American Rune client
channel.description: I'm using the American rune client but how do I make it connect to my server? I edited + compiled the EGUI but still doesnt work=\ Anyone had this problem before? (works for me I'm guessing it connects to 127.0.0.0 but not for my friend)Thanks
